description: A mysterious young girl from Natlan, Iansan is rumored to wield Pyro powers and a catalyst, bringing fiery destruction to her foes.

weapons.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

artifacts.name: Crimson Witch of Flames (2) + Gladiator’s Finale (2)

info: Iansan is a speculative Pyro catalyst DPS from Natlan. Build her for Pyro DMG, CRIT, and ATK%.

weapon.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

skills.name: Normal Attack: Ember Dance
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive Pyro attacks.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive Pyro attacks.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash a focused Pyro blast.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE Pyro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Blazing Spirits
skills.desc: Iansan summons fiery spirits that deal AoE Pyro DMG and increase her ATK.
skills.details_html:
Blazing Spirits
Summons fiery spirits that deal AoE Pyro DMG and increase Iansan's ATK for a short duration.

skills.name: Inferno Manifest
skills.desc: Iansan unleashes a massive Pyro attack, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and granting all allies increased Pyro DMG Bonus.
skills.details_html:
Inferno Manifest
Unleashes a massive Pyro attack, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and granting all allies increased Pyro DMG Bonus for a short duration.

passive_talents.name: Fiery Determination
passive_talents.desc: After using Blazing Spirits, Iansan's Pyro DMG is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Spirit of Natlan
passive_talents.desc: Allies affected by Inferno Manifest gain 20% increased ATK.

passive_talents.name: Child of Fire
passive_talents.desc: When Iansan is in the party, gliding stamina consumption is reduced by 20%.

constellations.name: C2: Burning Zeal
constellations.desc: After using Inferno Manifest, Iansan's CRIT Rate is increased by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: C3: Pyro Ascendant
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Blazing Spirits by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: C4: Spirit’s Blessing
constellations.desc: Allies affected by Inferno Manifest gain 20% increased Energy Recharge.

constellations.name: C5: Inferno’s Embrace
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Inferno Manifest by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: C6: Natlan’s Fury
constellations.desc: When Iansan triggers a Pyro-related reaction, her ATK is increased by 20% for 10s.
